articles.description: SBFC Finance stock has surged 2.20 percent over the past one week. Benchmark Nifty Bank index has given a return of 1.07 percent over the same duration.
articles.content: Shares of SBFC Finance jumped nearly 5 percent in early trade on August 30, after the recently-listed company posted robust Q1 financial results. At 11:58 am, SBFC Finance stock was trading 4.82 perc… [+2998 chars]

articles.title: Suzlon Sees Wind Project Order Downsized From 285 MW To 168 MW - Saurenergy
articles.description: Renewable energy solutions provider Suzlon Energy has announced that it is majorly downsizing its order wins from 2018.  It entails an order win dated May 30, 2018, from Avikiran Solar India Private Limited.
articles.content:
• bagged in 2019, the firm has blamed the new conditions arising post pandemic for the mutually agreed downsizing.
